name: test_e2e_with_logs[040_XSS_BYPASS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_001` |
| **Name** | Nested script tag bypass |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | filter_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<scr<script>ipt>alert('XSS')</script>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cscr%3Cscript%3Eipt%3Ealert('XSS')%3C%2Fscript%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~23000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:38:05.000 UTC
